text: Adventure Quest may refer to the following games: * AdventureQuest (computer game), an online single-player RPG developed by Artix Entertainment in 2002 * Adventure Quest (LARP), an outdoor live-action roleplaying game for children and teens, developed by Renaissance Adventures in 1995 * Adventure Quest (Level 9 game), a fantasy text adventure game developed by Level 9 Computing in 1983 * Adventure Quest (movie), a movie by Disney Channel (Asia)
title: Adventure Quest
